mapper.insert: insert into neuedu_product (id, category_id, name, subtitle, main_image, price, stock, status, is_new, is_hot, is_banner, create_time, update_time, sub_images, detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isBanner,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subImages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
